cost_functions.name: max_err_ddx_b_b_2nd
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddx_b_b_2nd - ddx_b_ex ) ./ max( abs( ddx_b_ex ))

cost_functions.name: max_err_ddy_b_b_2nd
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddy_b_b_2nd - ddy_b_ex ) ./ max( abs( ddy_b_ex ))

cost_functions.name: max_err_d2dx2_b_b_2nd
cost_functions.definition: abs( d2dx2_b_b_2nd - d2dx2_b_ex ) ./ max( abs( d2dx2_b_ex ))

cost_functions.name: max_err_d2dxdy_b_b_2nd
cost_functions.definition: abs( d2dxdy_b_b_2nd - d2dxdy_b_ex) ./ max( abs( d2dxdy_b_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_d2dy2_b_b_2nd
cost_functions.definition: abs( d2dy2_b_b_2nd - d2dy2_b_ex ) ./ max( abs( d2dy2_b_ex ))
